name: Deserted Island
overview: Deserted Island tells the story of an island sited 171 degrees 52 minutes east longitude 11 degrees 11 minutes north latitude. Unexplored waters of the Pacific. On 14th May of 1904 , a cargo ship was hitted by a storm and it discover an island. They sent a report of the island to the Geographical Society that is famed for scientists around the world. And six months later they sent a team to explore the island. The player can choose between 4 different leaders (Great Britain, Prussia, Japan or the United States) of the explorer's team. The team is 6 members: The leader, a hunter, an associate, a doctor, a research and a dog. The game is played in a first person perspective and the goal of the game is explore the island to discover new plants, minerals and animals. There are real and fictional creatures and plants. The player have to take care of his team 'cause the fatigue and hunger will make his health power decrease.
